2014.01.name: mediawiki/translate
2014.01.description: The only standard solution to translate any kind of text with an avant-garde web interface within MediaWiki, including your documentation and software

suggest.mediawiki\/babel: Users can easily indicate their language proficiency on their user page
suggest.mustangostang\/spyc: More recent version of the bundled spyc library
